Package index

Package Overview

High-level documentation topics covering major features and concepts.

diagram-construction
Stock-Flow Diagram Construction
algebraic-api
Algebraic API for Stock-Flow Diagrams
composition
Composition via Decorated Cospans
semantics
ODE Semantics for Stock-Flow Diagrams
visualization
Stock-Flow Diagram Visualization

Core Stock-Flow Modeling (Pipe-Based API)

Build stock-flow diagrams using the pipe-based API with magrittr pipes.

stock_flow_diagram()
Create an empty stock-flow diagram
add_stock()
Add a stock to a diagram
add_flow()
Add a flow to a diagram
add_link()
Add a link from a variable to a flow
add_variable()
Add an auxiliary variable to a diagram
add_sum_variable()
Add a sum variable to a diagram

Algebraic API

Build stock-flow diagrams using algebraic operators and mathematical notation.

stock()
Create a stock specification
flow()
Create a flow specification
variable()
Create a variable specification
sumvar()
Create a sum variable specification
`%->%`
Connect stocks via flows using algebraic notation
`%+%`
Combine stocks and flows using the combination operator
finalize()
Finalize a diagram specification
build_diagram()
Build a diagram from specifications
model()
Start a diagram specification
compile()
Compile model builder into diagram
`+`(<model_builder>)
Add specification to model builder

Compositional Modeling

Compose models using categorical operations (decorated cospans).

as_open_diagram()
Convert StockFlowDiagram to OpenStockFlowDiagram
compose()
Compose two stock-flow diagrams
close_diagram()
Close an OpenStockFlowDiagram
set_interface()
Set the interface for composition

ODE Generation and Simulation

Generate ordinary differential equations and solve them numerically.

generate_ode()
Generate ODE function from stock-flow diagram
solve_diagram()
Solve a stock-flow diagram as an ODE system
extract_parameters()
Extract parameters from a diagram's flow functions
check_ode_wellposed()
Check if ODE system is well-posed

Visualization

Visualize stock-flow diagrams and simulation results.

plot(<StockFlowDiagram>)
Plot a stock-flow diagram
plot_diagram()
Plot diagram using ggraph with custom styling
to_graphviz()
Export diagram to Graphviz DOT format
plot_solution()
Plot ODE solution time series
summary_plot()
Summary visualization of solution
phase_plot()
Create a phase plot of two stocks

S4 Classes

Formal S4 class definitions for diagram elements.

Stock-class
Stock (rectangle in stock-flow diagrams)
Flow-class
Flow (thick arrow in stock-flow diagrams)
Link-class
Link (thin arrow in stock-flow diagrams)
AuxiliaryVariable-class
Auxiliary Variable (circle in stock-flow diagrams)
SumVariable-class
Sum Variable (aggregates stocks)
StockFlowDiagram-class
Stock-Flow Diagram
OpenStockFlowDiagram-class
Open Stock-Flow Diagram
DecoratedCospan-class
Decorated Cospan

Utilities

Helper functions and utilities.

n_stocks()
Get number of stocks in diagram
n_flows()
Get number of flows in diagram
n_links()
Get number of links in diagram
stock_names()
Get stock names
flow_names()
Get flow names
get_stock_by_name()
Get stock by name
get_flow_by_name()
Get flow by name
get_variable_by_name()
Get variable by name
initial_state()
Get initial state vector
validate_diagram()
Validate a stock-flow diagram
reset_id_counter()
Reset ID counter (for testing)
